ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
let list = [];
let p = java.getString(".page-link@text").match(/\d\/(\d+)/);
//java.log(p[1]);
for(let i = 1; i <= (p && p[1]? p[1] : 0); i++){  
  let uri = baseUrl;
  let href = uri + `index_${i}.html`;
  //java.log(href);
  list.push(href);
}
list
</js>

   u = baseUrl.split(',')[0]
   cookie.removeCookie(u)
   // java.startBrowserAwait(u, "验证")
   java.webView(null, u, "document.cookie")
   ck = cookie.getCookie(u)

   url = u + "," + head
   result = java.ajax(url)
}
result

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

<js>

//第一种方法
url="http:"+result.match(/<script>initTxt\(\"([^\s]+)\",/)[1];
result = java.ajax(url);
con=result.match(/"content":"([\S\s]+)","replace"/)[1];
rep =result.match(/"replace":\{([\S\s]+)\}\}\)/)[1];
con_=String(JSON.stringify(con));
Aaa=rep.replace(/"/g,"");
rep_=String(JSON.stringify(Aaa)).replace(/"/g,"");
BBB=rep_.split(",");

for(let i=0;i<BBB.length;i++)
{
	CCC=BBB[i].split(":");
	java.log(CCC[0]+"----"+CCC[1]);
	while(con_.indexOf(CCC[1])!=-1){
	con_=con_.replace(CCC[1],CCC[0]);
		}
}
result=con_.replace(/\\\\n/g,"\<br\>");

/*

//第二种方法
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)/)[1];
var json=java.ajax(url);
//java.log(json);
if (json != null) {
            json = eval("(" + String(json).replace("_txt_call(", "").replace(/[;\)]+$/, "") + ")");
            //java.log(JSON.stringify(json));
            for (let key in json.replace) {
                let i = new RegExp(json.replace[key], "ig");
                json.content = json.content.replace(i, key)
            }
            result = json.content;
        }

*/
</js>

.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')

.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

<js>
//用于自动生成发现规则
b=false;
if(b){
let api="/app/lib/listv2?packageId=ihuaben&page=\{\{page\}\}&pageSize=20&sortType=clickcount_days_7&tagId=0&tokenId=NTAyNDUwNTA6MTYyNjcyMzYyMzpjMGU3ODlhNzQ3OTZmYmIy&keyword=";
let words=['都市言情','古代言情','玄幻言情','校园言情','穿越言情','灵异言情','短篇','二次元','灵异','都市','玄幻奇幻','历史军事','武侠仙侠','游戏竞技','科幻末世','明星同人','动漫同人','游戏同人','影视同人','小说同人'];
var s=[];
words.map(o=>{
var i={"title":o,"url":api+o}
s.push(i);
})
java.log(JSON.stringify(s))
}
java.getString("$.wordcount")
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*

function formatSeconds(value) { 
var theTime = parseInt(value);// 秒 
var theTime1 = 0;// 分 
var theTime2 = 0;// 小时 
if(theTime > 60) { 
theTime1 = parseInt(theTime/60); 
theTime = parseInt(theTime%60); 
if(theTime1 > 60) { 
theTime2 = parseInt(theTime1/60); 
theTime1 = parseInt(theTime1%60); } } 
var result = ""+parseInt(theTime)+"秒"; 
if(theTime1 > 0) { 
result = ""+parseInt(theTime1)+"分"+result; } 
if(theTime2 > 0) { 
result = ""+parseInt(theTime2)+"小时"+result; } 
return result; } 
if(jm.length>1){
key="S3VqaWFuZ0FwcDc0NzYwNQ==";
iv=jm[0];
data=jm[1];
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);
with(javaImport) {
    function decode(content) {
        decode = Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(content));
             byteArrayOutputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
             byteArrayInputStream = new ByteArrayInputStream(decode);
            gZIPInputStream = new GZIPInputStream(byteArrayInputStream);
            bArr = String(" ").getBytes(); 
            while (true) {
                read = gZIPInputStream.read(bArr);
                if (read > 0) {
                    byteArrayOutputStream.write(bArr, 0, read);
                } else {
                    gZIPInputStream.close();
                    byteArrayInputStream.close();
                    byteArrayOutputStream.close();
                    return byteArrayOutputStream.toString();
                }
          }
    }
}

decode(java.aesBase64DecodeToString(data,java.base64Decode(key),"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",java.base64Decode(iv)))}
else{"新章节需要解封\n"+"解锁时间还需："+formatSeconds(String(jms.body.left_seconds))}

{{@@text##^\d+.|(章\D*)\d*\.?##$1}}
##（.*|\(.*|【.*|“|”
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

);

}}

result=url+JSON.stringify(json)

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var sid = java.get('sid');
let i = String(book.bookUrl).includes('https:/');
if (i) { sid = String(book.bookUrl).match(/\d{3,}$/);}

cache.deleteMemory('pxcjj'); //仅通过正文打开详情，防错
if (sid == '🇨🇳') {
	let Info=source.getLoginInfoMap();
	let bkn = String(book.name);
	let id = java.hexDecodeToString(result).match(/\d+$/)[0];
	Info['书名'] = '';
	cache.put('pxsid','');
	Info['章节'] = bkn;
	cache.put('pxid',id);
	source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(Info));
	let length = leng(bkn);	
book.intro = (source.get('bq')==1?String(java.get('tags')).replace(/, /g,' #').replace('[','#').replace(']','\n\n'):'') + (length>18?('《'+book.name+'》\n'):'') + java.get('jianjie');
	rr='1';
	}

else {
let url = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/v2/novel/series?series_id=' + sid;
//修正bookurl
book.bookUrl = `data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(url)},{'type':''}`;

try {

jg = java.connect(gethd(url));
rr = jg.body();
if (jg.code() == 400) {
	source.login();
	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(500);
	rr = java.ajax(gethd(url));
	}

} catch(err) {
	rr={};
	java.toast('详情页链接加载失败'+sid);
	}

//设置解析结果
java.setContent(rr);


//更新更新时间
try {
let tm = java.getString('$.novel_series_latest_novel.create_date');
let d = new Date(tm);
d = java.timeFormatUTC(d,'yy/MM/dd',8*60*60*1000);
book.kind = String(book.kind).replace(/\d+\/\d+\/\d+|$/,d).replace('null','');
} catch(err) {java.toast('详情页内容错误');}

//获取书名并净化
let bkn = String(java.getString('$.novel_series_detail.title')).replace(/^《(.+)》$/,'$1');
book.name = bkn.replace(/[(（].{0,9}((?:仙侠|纯爱|后宫|萝莉).?){3,}.{0,9}[)）](?=\s*[一-ꀀ])/,'');

//java.log('┌获取书名\n[99:99.999] └'+book.name);

//获取书名失败
if (book.name == '') {
	//效果，unicode转字符
	// let ee = JSON.stringify(JSON.parse(rr) );
	let txte = java.getString('$..user_message',rr);
	//弹出提示，sid相应序列不存在
	java.longToast('\n未获取到书名\n'+txte);
	} else {
	
	//放入书名
	let Info=source.getLoginInfoMap();
	Info['书名'] = book.name;
	cache.put('pxsid',sid);
	Info['章节'] = '';
	cache.put('pxid','');
	source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(Info));
	
	//同名共存
	if (source.get('gc') == 1) book.name='📘'+book.name;
	}

//补充封面链接
if (book.coverUrl == null) {
	let img = java.getString('$.novel_series_latest_novel.image_urls.large');
	book.coverUrl = gethdi(img);
		
//java.log('┌获取封面\n[99:99.999] └'+book.coverUrl);
}

//计算书名长度
let length = leng(String(book.name));
//大于18个全角字符
if (length > 18) length= '《'+String(book.name).replace(/^📘/,'')+'》\n';
else length = '';


let jianjie = java.getString('$.novel_series_detail.caption');


book.intro = (source.get('bq')==1?String(java.get('tags')).replace(/, /g,' #').replace('[','#').replace(']','\n\n'):'') + length + java.get('jianjie');
java.put('jianjie',jianjie);
java.put('bookr',rr);
}
//java.put('i',0);

rr
</js>

<js>
if (page == 1) {
cache.putMemory('pxpage',page);
		if (/^\u200b/.test(key)) {
			let uid = cache.getFromMemory('pxuid');
			if (uid=='') java.longToast('\n请刷新书籍');
			else url = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/v1/user/novels?filter=for_android&user_id=' + uid;}
		else if (key.startsWith('作者@')) {
			let uid = key.slice(3);
			if (!/^\d{3,}$/.test(uid)) java.longToast('\n请输入正确的id');
			else url = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/v1/user/novels?filter=for_android&user_id='+uid;	}
		else if (/\d{5,}$/.test(key) ) {
			let sid = key.match(/\d+$/)[0];
			java.put('sid',sid);
			if (key.startsWith('作者')) java.longToast('\n请输入正确的搜索格式');
			else url = `data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(sid)},{'type':''}`;}
		else if (key.startsWith('正文@')) {
			url = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/v1/search/novel?filter=for_android&merge_plain_keyword_results=true&sort=date_desc&search_target=text&word='+key.slice(3);}
		else { url = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/v1/search/novel?filter=for_android&merge_plain_keyword_results=true&word='+key;}
source.put('nurls','http://127.0.0.1'); //重置储存的下一页

} else {url = source.get('nurls');}
gethd(url)
</js>

  //showjname设置章节名显示卷名true or false

  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.volumes.forEach((booklet) => {
  	  java.put('jname',booklet.name)
    array.push({ 
    	    name:'◆◇'+String(booklet.name)+'◇◆',
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.chapters.forEach((chapter) => {
href='http://api.ieasou.com/api/bookapp/chargeChapter.m?a=1&autoBuy=0&cid=eef_easou_book&version=002&os=android&udid=1c5b2618a57a0848e2510649dc1e03896f462284&appverion=1122&ch=blf1298_12337_001&session_id=-nEvkqSq_9ZyORN5OoVOOzJ&dzh=1&scp=0&appid=10001&utype=0&rtype=3&pushid=f97b7f81a269472c07708277b7c40b4f&ptype=5&gender=0&userInitPay=3&birt=1658424532472&instime=1658424529924&instId=1658424529924&chType=3&bidType=0&recSw=1&appType=0&gid='+java.get('gid')+'&nid='+chapter.nid+'&sort='+chapter.sort+'&gsort=0&sgsort=0&sequence=4&chapter_name='+chapter.chapter_name
      array.push({
        name: !java.get('jname')?chapter.chapter_name:((obj.showjname?'※'+java.get('jname')+'※ ':'').padStart(3,''))+chapter.chapter_name,
        url: href,
        time:"本章字数:"+String(chapter.wordCount)+"字",
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

bookSourceComment: 有时候网站会报错 502 导致书源请求失败，暂不清楚是网站限制访问频率，还是单纯的网站后端问题，我尝试加上遇到 502 就自动重试一次，发现还是直接 502，所以也没啥好办法，建议遇到搜索/发现/详情/目录/正文为空时，可以重试一次（目录/正文则是再 刷新 一次）

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>
